errors.error_description: The command `python manage.py migrate --database=all` uses an invalid option `--database=all`. The correct usage is either no option (to migrate all databases) or `--database` followed by a specific database alias.
correction_candidates: Replace the command with `python manage.py makemigrations`.
Change the command to `python manage.py migrate --all`.
Remove the `--database=all` option, leaving just `python manage.py migrate`.
Change the command to `python manage.py db migrate`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the `--database=all` option, leaving just `python manage.py migrate`.
